sec.p: KLM, RAL, and KJM conceived of the study and analyzed carotenoid content from wild-caught food items. RAL and KLM conducted carotenoid supplementation and chameleon husbandry. KLM, KJM, and MWB conducted plasma carotenoid analyses. DFD, KLM, and RAL conducted the wound-healing assays. MWB and KLM conducted the Nitric Oxide analyses and agglutination and lysis assays. All authors helped to draft the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
